title: Agent Session-Level Prompt Injection Governance
summary: Governance for session-level prompt injection. Provider-first model. Defines System Policy, AgentContext guidance, AgentMode guidance. Instruction DDR lifecycle: persistent vs initialization. Additive stacking. Turn-level injection and token budgeting out of scope.

providers.name: System Guidance Provider (AgentContext)
contributes: Instruction DDRs as system instructions (persistent + initialization)

providers.name: Mode Guidance Provider (AgentMode)
contributes: Instruction DDRs as system instructions (persistent + initialization)

instruction_ddr_lifecycle.persistent: Injected as system instruction on every request.
instruction_ddr_lifecycle.initialization: Injected as system instruction once per session/conversation; never re-injected.

invariants: Providers are authoritative; builder assembles only what providers contribute.
All contributions are additive; no overrides unless future DDR explicitly defines.
Turn-level injection mechanics are out of scope for AGN-028.
